An LLM (Large Language Model) is an AI system trained on vast amounts of textual data using deep learning and transformer architectures to understand and generate human-like language. The LLM API Pricing Calculator is a tool designed to help users estimate the cost of using various Large Language Model APIs, embeddings and Fine-tuning based on their specific usage needs. The pricing estimates are based on the latest publicly available pricing information from the API providers. summary: The search results provide URLs for LLM pricing calculators, including one from YourGPT.ai (https://yourgpt.ai/tools/openai-and-other-llm-api-pricing-calculator) and Docsbot.ai (https://docsbot.ai/tools/gpt-openai-api-pricing-calculator). The YourGPT.ai calculator allows comparison of pricing for different LLMs like OpenAI, Claude, and PaLM. A Reddit thread discusses OpenAI API costs for Home Assistant setups.
